name: Refrain (JessPak)
description:
A word association game that is based on song titles. Are you hip enough to play?

The last word in each of the song titles sparks the inspiration for the next. It's up to you how your song ends.

Made explicitly for #ArtIsEgoJam; as a result, I'm not responsible for any bugs with this, per the rules of #ArtIsEgoJam

Cover Art Photo by Andrey Konstantinov on Unsplash
